body_html:
The issue template, I think may be a very good tool to report a bug or a failure.
But the issue I proposed is a feature request, or abort the tf design plan. It seems that the issue template doesn't work well for me.
So can you give me some response? @asimshankar

body:
The issue template, I think may be a very good tool to report a bug or a failure.
But the issue I proposed is a feature request, or abort the tf design plan. It seems that the issue template doesn't work well for me.
So can you give me some response? @asimshankar
